backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining types (TaskType, Case, UserProfile, etc.) and functions for case management, user profiles, utilization stats, and access control with authorization checks on all operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence bugs: non-functional Mode toggle button in header navigation and failing case edit functionality in EditCaseModal.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, pages, and hooks describing their functionality, styling, state management, and integration patterns.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with sidebar, chart, and UI component color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Kipu Tracker Pro application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with Layout wrapper and routes for Dashboard, BatchEntry, Analytics, and AdminDashboard, wrapped in ThemeProvider with Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Empty component file for displaying access denied errors to non-admin users.
frontend/src/components/BreakOverlay.tsx: Full-screen overlay component displaying animated coffee icon and live timer during break mode with Resume Work button to end break.
frontend/src/components/CaseList.tsx: Table component displaying recent cases with task type, case number, case type, duration, and edit button; includes helper functions for formatting and labeling.
frontend/src/components/CaseTimerControl: Timer control component for tracking work cases with auto/manual time entry modes, supporting EMR-specific fields (case origin, ticket status, escalation) and break functionality. Handles timer start/stop, validation, and case creation via API mutations.
frontend/src/components/EditCaseModal.ts: Modal component for editing existing case records with datetime pickers, task type selection, and EMR-specific fields. Validates time ranges and updates cases via the useEditCase mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component providing navigation header with links to Dashboard, Batch Entry, Analytics, and Admin pages. Includes theme toggle and mode switcher (auto/manual) that propagates to child components.
frontend/src/components/PersonalStats.ts: Dashboard stats component displaying shift progress and utilization percentages based on today's cases, excluding break times. Calculates remaining shift time using user's shift preferences.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Theme toggle button component using next-themes to switch between light and dark modes with animated sun/moon icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication. Handles anonymous/authenticated actor creation and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useElapsedTime.ts: Custom hook that calculates and returns formatted elapsed time (HH:MM:SS) from a start timestamp, updating every second while active.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and cases, including operations like getCallerUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile, getAllCases, createCase, editCase, deleteCase, and batchCreateCases with proper cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining color variables for UI components, charts, buttons, and sidebar elements with a warm palette for light mode and navy blue theme for dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying team-wide metrics including total cases, total time, average case time, and recent team activity with case details and task type labels.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Analytics page that calculates and displays case statistics by task type, provides CSV export functionality for all case data with comprehensive field mappings, and shows time-based metrics.
frontend/src/pages/BatchEntry.tsx: Batch entry page allowing users to create multiple case entries simultaneously with dynamic form rows, validation for required fields based on task type, and bulk submission using batchCreateCases mutation.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page component that orchestrates PersonalStats, CaseTimerControls, CaseList, BreakOverlay, and EditCaseModal components with state management for break mode and case editing.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page component (content truncated in provided input).
frontend/src/utils/timeHelpers.ts: Utility functions for time handling including conversions between Date objects, datetime-local strings, and nanosecond timestamps, with IST timezone formatting, time range validation, overlap detection, and duration formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings for borders/shadows/fonts, and animation keyframes for UI components.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a multi-user EMR case tracking system with Motoko backend and React frontend, listing existing features, known issues (mode toggle and case edit bugs), and architectural notes about healthcare support workflow implementation.
